events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but the shipment still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated for several days, and I'm really concerned about the delay.
The system has tagged this case under Delivery Delay based on keywords such as 'shipment', 'tracking', and 'delay' in the customer's initial message.
Customer service agent Julia has been assigned to assist with this delivery delay case to provide timely support to the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your concern regarding your late shipment, and I'm here to help resolve this as soon as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you've received? This will help me check the status more accurately.
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is 789654123, and the last tracking update was showing the package arriving at a local facility three days ago.
I have contacted the shipping carrier on your behalf and escalated the issue. We expect an update within 48 hours, and if your package doesn't arrive soon, we'll expedite a replacement shipment.
Thanks for the update and for taking action quickly. I appreciate you following up with the carrier and the potential for a replacement if needed.
The carrier has located your package, and it is now scheduled for delivery tomorrow. We have also updated your order status accordingly. Please let us know if you encounter any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your package and that everything arrived as expected. We appreciate your patience during this delay.
Yes, the package arrived safely yesterday, and everything is perfect. Thank you very much for your assistance throughout this process.
We are glad your package arrived and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Closing the case now; please contact us anytime for future assistance.
We have sent a short satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service. Thank you for choosing us!
